title: Getting "Disk Error" when trying to boot LiveXP from USB flash drive

forumNotes.author: FiZiX
forumNotes.content:
I've installed LiveXP to my 1GB flash drive using the BootSDI method with WinBuilder 074 Beta 4. However, I'm getting this error when trying to boot from the key: ``` Disk Error Press any key to restart ```
I believe this error is thrown by NTLDR so I'm pretty sure it's getting that far. Does anyone know what might cause this? I've attached my log. #### Attached Files {#attach_wrap} * [![Attached File](http://reboot.pro/public/style_extra/mime_types/zip.gif)](http://reboot.pro/index.php?s=287063ddfc43ec39396f1bd8f9efce06&app=core&module=attach§ion=attach&attach_id=6291 "Download attachment") [**log.rar**](http://reboot.pro/index.php?s=287063ddfc43ec39396f1bd8f9efce06&app=core&module=attach§ion=attach&attach_id=6291 "Download attachment") **71.84KB** 315 downloads

forumNotes.author: FiZiX
forumNotes.content:
> I've installed LiveXP to my 1GB flash drive using the BootSDI method with WinBuilder 074 Beta 4. However, I'm getting this error when trying to boot from the key: > > ``` > Disk Error > > Press any key to restart > ``` > >
> > I believe this error is thrown by NTLDR so I'm pretty sure it's getting that far. Does anyone know what might cause this? I've attached my log. > >
>
Nevermind, I got it working by just using PEtoUSB.
